survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee preferences regarding telecommuting arrangements in the post-pandemic era, focusing on productivity, work-life balance, and employer support.

questions.question_text: How many days per week would you prefer to work remotely in a hybrid work model?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button input for clear single-choice selection. Ensure options cover all potential preferences.

script.question_text: How many days per week would you prefer to work remotely in a hybrid work model?

questions.question_text: What are the top three benefits you experience from remote work? (Select up to three)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE), max 3 selections allowed

script.question_text: What are the top three benefits you experience from remote work? (Select up to three)

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges you face while working remotely.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Use a text box with a 500-character limit.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges you face while working remotely.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your employer's support for remote work (e.g., technology, communication tools)?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced.
